Despite some mostly minor issues, still reigns supreme as the best competitive FPS ever made.
Fun both casually and competitively. Great mechanics, high skill ceiling, and a classic fps. Great game.

Fajna giera, ale zróbcie coś z cheaterami, a nie wypuszczanie tylko nowych skinów i skrzynek ;p
Dünyanın en zevkli, en heyacanlı, en çekişmeli FPS oyunu olduğunu tüm dünya kabul etmiştir.

I love this game, and I have played a lot of it. I am sitting around MGE rank at the moment.

CSGOs main issue atm, since it went free to play, is cheaters, tons and tons of cheaters. I have a prime account, and I'd like to think I have a high trust factor, but nearly every other game there is a cheater, using some for of hack. I know, I know, you are just thinking 'get good scrub' but when you see the message 'one or more players you have recently reported has been banned from official valve servers' nearly every time you launch the game, it leaves something to be questioned. It's hard to have fun when you are getting killed through a wall every round. 
I guess it's free, so try it, it is one of the greatest FPS games out there, but come one valve, fix the damn matchmaking please.
